answers.answer: Hi, based on the positions the nerves can get compressed and cause symptoms. As you were under the effect of anesthesia you were not aware of the symptoms developing. Now, you can use Lyrica for short term and follow it up with physiotherapy, this will help with nerve regeneration. Also, check to rule out diabetes. Regards.
